title: Resident Emergency Relief Fund
description: To provide assistance to residents experiencing financial distress associated with times of crisis, like COVID-19, as determined by the CU School of Medicine. Support includes, but is not limited to basic needs, mental health support/therapy, self-care.
marketingContent: To provide assistance to residents experiencing financial distress associated with times of crisis, like COVID-19, as determined by the CU School of Medicine. Support includes, but is not limited to basic needs, mental health support/therapy, self-care.
